title: Syndra walk
body:
I've recently some Syndra bugs, about her movement animation

I've played Justicar Syndra and her movements seems to mimic the Atlantean Syndra(at random periods of time during the game) and when she's not mimic-ing Atlantean Syndra her movement look as if she's sprinting

replies.body:
Hey Adelaid! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working to resolve it. We made some backend changes last patch - modifying the size of her files, annnnd it looks like her run file got a bit jumbled.
